transcript:
Customer: Sandeep 376000 abhi hai. 
Executive: Hanji sir, hello.
Customer: Hanji, hi sir, good evening.
Executive: Hanji, hanji sir, main Vishal baat kar raha hun India Mart office se sir, kaise hain aap?
Customer: Hanji, hanji Vishal ji, hanji bahut badhiya.
Executive: Aapka jo request tha na sir service band karne ka, ye Shri Krishna company wala. Hanji.
Executive: Wo main uske liye inform kar raha tha sir, wo process ho gaya sir, theek hai.
Executive: To aapke
Executive: Sir isme jitne din ki bhi aapki India Mart pe service chali hui hogi na.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Wo aapka deduct hota hai, balance jo bhi aapka bachta hai wo aapko refund ho jata hai sir. Kitna final final mode dena padega.
Customer: Hmm, amount aap lagaiye jo aapne pay kiya hoga na India Mart pe, ek minute rukiyega.
Customer: Ji sir.
Executive: Jaise aapne pay kiya hoga 30 ye pay kiya tha 37760 rupees ka tha. Theek hai.
Customer: 37000 main exact bata raha hun.
Executive: 37760 aapne pay kiya tha sir.
Customer: Achcha theek hai sir.
Executive: Theek hai. Isme isme GST kitna hai?
Executive: GST isme aap lagaiye 18% rehta hai.
Customer: Matlab total 28000 hi man ke chalenge. Main main aapko bata deta hun, main aapko bata deta hun isme aap ye lagaiye jitne din bhi service chali rahegi na per day ka cost laga lijiye uske according aapko refund mil jayega sir. Iski aapne kaise 28000 pe nahi isme calculation rehti hai sir jaise aapka ye ho gaya na aap puri pe hi rahegi. Aap ye lagaiye aapki service activate hui thi.
Customer: Kitni chali hai aapki main aapko bata raha hun.
Executive: Aapki service India Mart pe activate hui thi 10th October 2025 ki sir. Theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai sir.
Executive: 10 se leke 10 November tak ho gaya apna 30 din 30 din calendar days jo bhi rehte hain.
Executive: Aur uske baad jo ha uske baad jo 18 hai to ye laga lijiye aath din aur laga lijiye. Theek hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To total 31 ho gaye 39 days ho gaye. matlab 30 39 days ho gaye 39 39 days ke sir 39 ya 40 laga sakte hain agar 31 din ban rahe honge to.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Ye banenge apne 4138 4138.
Executive: Sir exact amount main aapko abhi nahi confirm kar pata wo thode time baad mujhe pata chal jata hai theek hai. Baki lumpsum itna aapko mil jayega sir.
Customer: Kitna?
Executive: Jo aapka hai aap nikal lijiye jaise aap ye hai 37 hai na.
Customer: 37800 ek minute rukiyega.
Executive: Aap lagaiye aapko iska mil jayega ye 33000 ke kareeb aapko return iska mil jayega. 3360 ban rahe hain. Ha matlab
Executive: Lumpsum itna hi sir maine aapko bataya hai theek hai. To ye main aapko ek cheez aur bata deta hun yahan se process ho gaya hai ye aapko within a week aapke account me receive ho jayega sir.
Customer: Kon se account me?
Executive: Jis jis mode se aapne payment ki hoti hai na UPI se usi ke andar aapko mil jayega sir.
Customer: Achcha theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir. To jo concern tha sir main yahan par close kar deta hun. Baki further update ke liye na aap mera number save rakhiye sir ye wala main aapko usi pe koi bhi information hogi wo provide kar paunga sir. Theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Okay sir, thank you have a nice day.
Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer inquired about refund amount.

Resolution:

- Executive explained refund calculation process.

- Executive confirmed refund will be processed within a week.



Next Steps: 

- None

Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, subscription, verification
